amendment.description: To require electronic filing and establish a public database for lobbyists for foreign governments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2960 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2960 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S2491, S2499; text: CR S2491) To require electronic filing and establish a public database for lobbyists for foreign governments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2960 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2960 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Levin.
